lead_paragraph: Mired in a four-game losing streak and sinking further out of contention in the Western Conference, the New Orleans Pelicans were in desperate need of a confidence builder.

headline.print_headline: Pelicans Snap 4-Game Skid With Easy Win Over Wolves
headline.main: Pelicans Snap 4-Game Skid With Easy Win Over Wolves

snippet: Mired in a four-game losing streak and sinking further out of contention in the Western Conference, the New Orleans Pelicans were in desperate need of a confidence builder....
